title: Parameters for Multi Object Tracker Node

publish_rate.description: Timer frequency to output with delay compensation.

enable_delay_compensation.description: If True, tracker use timers to schedule publishers and use prediction step to extrapolate object state at desired timestamp.

consider_odometry_uncertainty.description: If True, consider odometry uncertainty in tracking.

tracker_lifetime.description: Lifetime of the tracker in seconds.

min_known_object_removal_iou.description: Minimum IOU between associated objects with known label to remove younger tracker

min_unknown_object_removal_iou.description: Minimum IOU between associated objects with unknown label to remove unknown tracker

UNKNOWN.description: Number of measurements to consider tracker as confident for unknown object classes.

CAR.description: Number of measurements to consider tracker as confident for car object classes.

TRUCK.description: Number of measurements to consider tracker as confident for truck object classes.

BUS.description: Number of measurements to consider tracker as confident for bus object classes.

TRAILER.description: Number of measurements to consider tracker as confident for trailer object classes.

MOTORBIKE.description: Number of measurements to consider tracker as confident for motorbike object classes.

BICYCLE.description: Number of measurements to consider tracker as confident for bicycle object classes.

PEDESTRIAN.description: Number of measurements to consider tracker as confident for pedestrian object classes.

publish_processing_time.description: Enable to publish debug message of process time information.

publish_tentative_objects.description: Enable to publish tentative tracked objects, which have lower confidence.

publish_debug_markers.description: Enable to publish debug markers, which indicates association of multi-inputs, existence probability of each detection.

diagnostics_warn_delay.description: Delay threshold for warning diagnostics in seconds.

diagnostics_error_delay.description: Delay threshold for error diagnostics in seconds.
